name: Alex school (Hotel trip edition)
description:
This is the Hotel trip edition of Alex school. It's still the same like Alex school but with a bit change like:

-New loading screen with tips

-Some classrooms now have a bed inside instead of the table

-Outside is now night time and also has a building outside

Credits:

Paulor94 - Map creator

mystman12 - Original creator of Baldi's basic

MariiBound2003 - Made Marii character sprite

S_Pider Dev - Inspiration for this custom map

8jau9V2GhHy3g12 and __colorPencil (Twitter user) - The owner of the arts on the good ending.

Also in case you guys don't know. The mus_School music is called
"Vyacheslav Mescherin Orchestra - Night Melody"
